input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product features and product name information.

Product name:
Bernat Baby Coordinates Yarn - His Jeans

Product features:
Bernat Baby Co-Ordinates Yarn
For knit and crochet baby items
Easy care, wash and wear
Weight category: 3
Color: His Jeans
Solids: 75.2% acrylic, 22.2% rayon, 2.6% nylon
White & Ombres: 71.2% acrylic, 25.6% rayon, 3.2% nylon
Solids: 5 ounces (140 grams) 388 yards
White: 5 ounces (140 grams) 457 yards
Ombres: 4-1/4 ounces (120 grams) 392 yards
Gauge: lightweight #34"=22 stitches on size 6 needles
Not dye lotted
Machine wash and dry

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Bernat Baby Coordinates Yarn in His Jeans is an easy care, wash and wear yarn for knitting and crocheting baby items. This lightweight, category 3 yarn comes in solid His Jeans and is made of 75.2% acrylic, 22.2% rayon, and 2.6% nylon. Bernat Baby Coordinates Yarn is also available in white and ombres and is made of 71.2% acrylic, 25.6% rayon, and 3.2% nylon. This versatile yarn is ideal for a wide range of knit and crochet baby patterns and comes in a range of beautiful shades. The solids version of this yarn comes in 5 ounces (140 grams) and 388 yards and the white and ombres version comes in 5 ounces (140 grams) and 457 yards. The gauge is lightweight #34"=22 stitches on size 6 needles. Bernat Baby Coordinates Yarn is a great choice for soft, durable baby projects and is machine wash and dry.
input_text.Response B:
This soft, lightweight baby yarn from Bernat Baby Co-Ordinates Yarn, with its lovely shimmer effect, is perfect for both knitting and crocheting. Enjoy easy care with a beautiful, clear shade range for both baby afghans and garments, for confident gift-giving. The pastels, bright colors, and soft silky feel make it perfect for the very young to the young-at-heart. The content and volume are as follows:
Solids: 75.2% acrylic, 22.2% rayon, 2.6% nylon
White & Ombres: 71.2% acrylic, 25.6% rayon, 3.2% nylon
Solids: 5 ounces (140 grams) 388 yards
White: 5 ounces (140 grams) 457 yards
Ombres: 4-1/4 ounces (120 grams) 392 yards
The gauge is:
Light weight #34"=22 stitches on size 6 needles
Weight category: 3
Suggested crochet hook: G6
Color name: His Jeans
This yarn is not dye lotted. Machine wash and dry.
